questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the dominant geometric shape of this product?

Based on the image alone, what color is the carabiner clip attached to the main component?
Describe the visible markings on the side of the triangular portion; what is their nature?
Examining the product's form, is its triangular component hollow or solid?
What is the apparent color of the primary body of this product, disregarding the clip?
